participant_1.name: Amina
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, Amina loves to express herself through dance and embraces life with enthusiasm.
participant_1.background: my aunt helped me escape when i was of. i like to dance. now i live in the united states. i was born in somalia.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Reserved and thoughtful, Jake enjoys quiet activities and has a strong bond with his pets.
participant_2.background: i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. i go to the gym regularly. i have short hair. two dogs live with me.

content.text:
I am little bit shy☺️ 
Tell me about yourself!
I am looking for a job do you like to dance?
i go to gym regularly. do you do sports?
I do not do sports, i do not do you do you was born in somalia?
I am not very good at it. I am more of a homebody.
